name: Hire the Fempire
description: Social project to hire women in tech. A company can solve its diversity problem quickly by hiring the teams of female junior developers paired with a senior developer mentor.
solutions: We prepared Brading, POS material to support the community.
All UX/UI and Illustrations were covered by Valor Software team.
Webflow was delected as a main development tool.
outcome: An application, which can help you solve diversity problem quickly by hiring a team of female junior developers paired with a senior developer mentor. This mentorship model creates inclusive environments for new developers to thrive.
